driver:
@@DRVNAME@@ http://gimp-print.sourceforge.net/ gs -q -dSAFER -dNOPAUSE -dBATCH -sDEVICE=stp %A%Z -sOutputFile=- - GIMP-Print supports a wide variety of Epson Stylus, HP DeskJet, LaserJet, Canon BubbleJet, Lexmark inkjet printers, with the primary goal being uncompromising quality. Epson Stylus printers in particular are supported in all resolutions and modes, and the latest printers are capable of producing prints that rival photographic prints in quality. This package also offers much faster printing for high quality text and presentation graphics when required.

The execution information currently here corresponds to driver version @@STPVER@@. If you use another version, use the Foomatic data which comes with the GIMP-Print package.

Note that the Foomatic datafiles provided here are only for the GhostScript driver of GIMP-Print. For the native CUPS driver there are special PPD files provided by the GIMP-Print package.

To get a pre-patched/pre-compiled GNU-GhostScript 6.51 with this driver (version 4.2.0) download Daniele Berti's source and binary RPMS. @@STPRINTERS@@
